---
category: news
title: "Divide and conquer: Mars rovers could be superseded by swarms of two-wheeled robots"
excerpt: "Skoltech scientists have proposed a concept for a modular Mars exploration rover. Leveraging the power of cooperative robotics, the new system first described in an Acta Astronautica paper consists of four two-wheeled robots that can operate independently or combine in various constellations."
